Class OrderDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.chmut.giftit.dao.impl.OrderDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dao<java.lang.Long,Order>, OrderDao

    public class OrderDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements OrderDao
    The Order dao class provides manipulation of Order entity with database.
    Author:
    Sergei Chmut.
